item.title: Apollo, BlackRock, Oaktree Ask Judge to Toss Altice Lawsuit
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Lenders to Altice USA Inc., including Apollo Capital Management, BlackRock Financial Management and Oaktree Capital Management, asked a federal judge to dismiss a lawsuit accusing them of colluding to shut the company out of the US credit market. The motion, filed late Friday in New Y...
